    • Method Detail

      • playerCanReach

        public boolean playerCanReach()
        Check if player can reach the desired case, also handle behavior of the player with his environment : - Set score if go on item
        Returns:
        false if the desired case is an obstacle
        See Also:
        - Spawn the exit if go on magical ball, - Kill the player if go on an deadly point, - Finish the game if player get to the exit, - To get the type of a case :, - Get type at specific coordinates

      • playerDie

        public void playerDie()
        Check if player get on a deadly case, then finish the game.
        See Also:
        - Display a message To get the type of a case, and then its behavior:, - Get type at specific coordinates

      • playerWin

        public void playerWin()
        Check if player get on a exit case, then finish the game.
        See Also:
        - Display a message To get the type of a case:, - Get type at specific coordinates

      • isGameEnd

        public boolean isGameEnd()
        Use for the controller to check if the game is end.
        Returns:
        True if the game is end

                             int moveY)
        Set the player future location, in function of its actual position and the user input
        Parameters:

        moveY - User input : movement in Y
        See Also:

        public boolean spellCanReach()
        Check if spell can reach the desired case, also handle behavior of the player with his environment : - Set score if go on item
        Returns:
        false if the desired case is an obstacle
        See Also:
        - Spawn teh exit if go on magical ball, - Kill the player if go on an deadly point, - Finish the game if player get to the exit, To get the type of a case :, IModel.getType(int, int)
